got.name: THOR
got.title: God of Thunder
got.tagline: Master of lightning and storms, commanding the fury of the heavens.
got.description: Master of lightning and storms, Thor commands the fury of the heavens. With each strike of his mighty hammer, thunder echoes across the battlefield, bringing divine justice to those who dare challenge the storm.

abilities.name: Lightning Strike
abilities.desc: Summon devastating bolts from the sky

abilities.name: Storm Shield
abilities.desc: Create a protective barrier of swirling winds

abilities.name: Thunderclap
abilities.desc: Release a shockwave that stuns enemies

gof.name: VULCAN
gof.title: God of Fire
gof.tagline: Born from the heart of a volcano, wielding the eternal flame.
gof.description: Born from the heart of a volcano, Vulcan wields the eternal flame. His power scorches the earth, turning enemies to ash and forging new worlds from the crucible of destruction.

gow.name: POSEIDON
gow.title: God of Water
gow.tagline: Ruler of the oceans, master of the tides and the deep.
gow.description: Ruler of the oceans and master of the tides, Poseidon controls the ebb and flow of water itself. His power can heal or destroy, bringing life-giving rain or devastating tsunamis.

goa.name: ZEPHYR
goa.title: God of Air
goa.tagline: Swift as the wind, free as the sky, commanding the breath of life.
goa.description: Swift as the wind and free as the sky, Zephyr commands the very breath of the world. Invisible yet omnipresent, the air god strikes with the speed of a hurricane and the grace of a gentle breeze.

gom.name: HEPHAESTUS
gom.title: God of Metal
gom.tagline: Forged in fire, tempered by time, master of the forge.
gom.description: Forged in the deepest mines and tempered by eternal flames, Hephaestus shapes metal with divine precision. His creations are unbreakable, his armor impenetrable, his will unyielding as steel.

goe.name: GAIA
goe.title: God of Earth
goe.tagline: Ancient and eternal, embodying the strength of mountains.
goe.description: Ancient and eternal, Gaia embodies the strength of mountains and the fertility of soil. With roots deeper than time itself, the earth god brings both nurturing growth and devastating earthquakes.
